abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Industrial Credit Project
            will provide lending to help finance the foreign exchange
            cost of imported equipment for investments in medium- and
            small-size industrial projects in the Republics of
            Bosnia-Herzegovinn, Montenegro, Macedonia and the Autonomous
            Province of Kosovo.
